group_1.textRight: ...This is...my...

group_1.textLeft: Please tell me more about it.

group_1.textRight: Ah...right...@Where do I start...

group_1.textCenter: I played baseball up until I entered junior high.
We were such a small team that we couldn't@even play a game if anyone was missing,
but we had a better sense of unity than@anyone else, and we practiced a ton!
And then...we finally made it to the championship@match of the prefectural tournament,
but on the day of the big game, my brother@came down with a high fever...
I became a Magical Girl to cure him.

group_1.textRight: ...I was pretending not see to it,@but, deep down...
When I saw that picture of myself as a Witch,@I couldn't help but remember...
Even though I put all my passion@into baseball and the team,
I was told that girls can't play@on the junior high baseball team...
So I gave up on being a player@and picked up cheerleading.
I really wanted to keep being part of baseball with@everyone, but it was so frustrating giving up...
Even when I tried to ignore those ugly truths,@I still couldn't feel satisfied.
I was so jealous of everyone who could play@baseball that I almost wanted to blame them...
But I'm not in despair anymore.
I searched around again to see if there was anything@other than baseball I could devote myself to.
Thanks to that, I remembered that I'm doing@cheerleading to fight alongside everyone else.
I re-realized it!
That's why, I'm sure that the choice@I made back then wasn't wrong.
I can believe in that again now.
But...
I was sad that my desire to play baseball@with everyone didn't work out,
and it's true that I put my true feelings aside@and gave my all to cheerleading.
So just for today, I'd like to send a shout out@to all the hard work I've put in!
It gave me a good opportunity@to look back on the past.
Thank you very much!@Alina!

group_1.textLeft: I never expected to be thanked...

group_1.textCenter: I, Alina, should be the one thanking you.
Thanks to you, I got an up close and personal look...
